title: The Evil to Come
description: In this Dateline classic, successful businesswoman and caring mom Peggy Nadell is found murdered in her Rockland County home. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on May 28, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
